short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare performance between 2 date ranges in Google Ads visually and just in a second.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GAds Easy compare is an extension for Google Chrome with which you can easily compare two periods of time on the Google Ads platform.

The extension, once activated, "paints" in Google Ads the negative values in red and the positive ones in green, when a comparison between two time ranges is selected.

There is nothing to configure, just install and use.

The use of GAds Easy compare can cause:

- Saving time in campaign management
- Make better decisions faster, since at a glance, you can go directly to the point of the campaigns or ad groups that you want to optimize.
- Prioritize those campaigns, ad groups or Keywords that require optimization before the rest, either due to the effect on Investment, on R.O.I. or general results.
